<title level="1" right="Setting Article" pfs="">[Cults of the Darklands](/Articles.aspx?ID=17)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #155: Lord of the Black Sands](/Sources.aspx?ID=33) pg. 60</row>

Numberless evils lurk beneath the earth! Learn of cults that seek power, knowledge, or oblivion in the darkness.
name: Cults of the Darklands
